about_the_game:
In a life of ordinary, embrace an experience in a place of extraordinary.


Spring in Summer is a light-hearted heartwarming experience in which you’ll find joy, sadness, and fulfillment being a part of the cast, the world, and the journey itself. Unweave relationships, make an impact on the lives of others, and fulfill your heart’s purpose in this extraordinary adventure!

An experience with many storytelling combinations and outcomes driven by your own unique personality, agency, and actions. This is your journey, your friendships, your resolutions, no one else's!


Embark on a journey about connecting with the hearts of the quirky individuals of Myth’s Vale: a mystical island where mythical creatures gather in our modern times. Meet Aithlin, an amnesic jackalope ghost who mysteriously enters your ordinary life to discover why she wasn’t able to move on after her untimely death. Get transported with her to the extraordinary world of Myth’s Vale to help her unravel the mystery behind why she’s trapped as a ghost.

Being invisible and unable to interact with others, Aithlin can only rely on you to discover the missing fulfillment keeping her from passing 8 years ago. Befriend and rekindle her old circle of friends, work together to unravel what happened, and collaborate in grand activities to fulfill her dying wish, all while making an impact in the community, and discovering the intertwining relationships and the many personal dreams of Aithlin’s close-friends and the other residents of Myth’s Vale.

"Hi Human,
Aithlin here! I don’t know why I’m dead… and I especially don’t know why I had to appear at your messy place out of so many other better places. Sad! If being stuck with you the whole game wasn’t enough already, well guess what? I’m stuck with you on this page too! So I better give you the rundown on what’s amazingly cool on your journey ahead in Spring in Summer.. so you don’t make a fool out of me… I mean us… well technically only yourself :3"




It’s your personal journey: where it goes depends on your involvement. How you play truly matters and can change the whole dynamic of your journey, and how your journey unfolds is entirely up to you. Everything that you do has lasting impacts that makes your journey in Spring in Summer uniquely yours!

"That cake you dissed at the beginning of the game? You can bet Folwin remembers that one! That helping hand you gave Selphie when the Twilight Brigade needed you? They definitely got your back now! When you laughed at Aithlin’s cupcake incident story… Wait, you laughed at that?! I was so miserable, how dare you! Everything you do will stay with you all the way to the end, jerk!"




Be honest, be a troll, or just have fun! Be who you are, be who you didn't know you are, or be who you want to be! Dialogue choices are uniquely designed for you to be able to do what you truly want and to express yourself authentically.

"Want to comfort a character and be nice to them? You can! Want to say something nice but sarcastically instead? You can! Want to diss someone, but make it sound nicer because you don’t want to hurt their feelings and be too mean, but you still want to express what you think? You also can!"





You are welcome to become a part of the circle of friends and bring your own personal flavour of character into this group’s chemistry. Depending on your attitude, personality, and actions, the overall chemistry of the group will blend according to you being an additional peer amongst them.

"My friends are the best! I’m pretty sure you’ll get along just fine, but that depends on what you do with them. Become close friends, good friends, rivals, or frenemies, that’s entirely up to you! (But hopefully you all just get along, so don’t be a jerk!)"





See the impacts of your presence and journey on Myth’s Vale’s community. You thought what you did only impacted people directly around you? Think again! Your presence in Myth’s Vale also affects all of its community in unique and fun ways.

"Like that new Bun King that just opened! That wasn’t there before, but after you created a buzz in the community about their delicious char siu bao, now it is! (dammit, I wish I was still alive to eat some!)"





Myth’s Vale’s community is small and tightly-knit: conversing with them and bringing up different conversation topics may produce interesting results and uncover unexpected secrets! You’ll be amazed how much you can discover by just speaking with one character or another.

"Like how Folwin basically tells you how to find the code for Selphie’s safe in the demo, but hey, I didn’t tell you that, ok?"





Everyone is looking for what makes their heart fulfilled. It is the same with the people you meet in Myth’s Vale, and your unexpected presence and actions can influence the search for their own heart’s fulfillment.

"Also don’t forget mine, ok? That’s like the main reason you're here after all, so don’t you dare forget about me!"





Dive into another LORE NINE’s signature personal and purposeful game experience that is thoughtfully and meticulously designed with depths and details for a memorable and meaningful impact.

"Well, I know you ended up here because of me… but hopefully you also find something for yourself along the way."
detailed_description:
About the Demo

Welcome to Spring in Summer’s demo! The current demo is a standalone experience that serves as a proof of concept of the full game. Meet some of Spring in Summer’s iconic main characters (Aithlin, Selphie, Folwin, and yourself!) and enjoy hanging out with them in this short quirky slice of life adventure!

If you like what you see, please consider wishlisting the game: this would help us greatly!

The full game is still in development, so we would love to hear your feedback and reviews, as these will be extremely valuable in our development of the final game.


More Games by LORE NINE

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 4GB Memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 4GB Memory+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Spring in Summer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A storytelling sandbox adventure driven by your own personality about helping a jackalope ghost who cannot move on. Explore a mystical island inhabited by quirky mythical creatures, connect with the hearts of its community, & discover one’s heart fulfillment in your own heartwarming personal journey
